title: Master Level Clinician- School Based Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview consisted of one virtual  interview with the company and one in-person interview at the school you would be working at, both the company and school had to be impressed with you in order to be able to get the job.
Interview Questions: Please describe why you be a good fit for this role.

title: Group Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Chattanooga, TN) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: I met with the BSL Program Coordinator and her supervisor, they both asked me quite a few questions. It was a WONDERFUL experience. I enjoyed the process and the questions asked really allowed me to show my assets.
Interview Questions: Are you more of an analytical Thinker or Creative thinker?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at McNabb Center in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very personable and caring staff. They are clearly passionate about the work that they do and the people that they serve. The interview was more conversation based than asking straight questions.
Interview Questions: How would your previous experience fit with the job?

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at McNabb Center
Interview Descriptions: It was really straight forward process. I had only one interview with the hiring manager. The manager told me on the call that they were interested in me. Then they called all supervisors for the last 5 years plus 3 references.
Interview Questions: I was asked about team work and flexibility

title: Program Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: 2 interviews one with direct supervisor, one the. With supervisor and senior director. Went to same location both times I was interviewed. Ask a lot of information, and both was very informative about the job and matching skills with what was required.
Interview Questions: A lot about previous experience in supervising.

title: Staff Development Trainer and Personnel Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: My interview process was fantastic. The supervisor was very prepared, and asked really strong questions to determine my ability to do the job. She was really kind and personable, and made me feel comfortable when I came in. She was prepared enough to know who I was and made it apparent that she had taken the time to read my resume and cover letter.
Interview Questions: One part of this job is recruiting. If I were to tell you that we were struggling to hire nurses, & that I needed you to try to recruit nurses to hire, what steps would you take to do this?

title: Milieu Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and after about two weeks received a call to schedule an interview. The interview was relaxed and was an overview of the position and then I was handed paperwork to fill out for a background check, degree verification, and fingerprint check. There weren't any questions really asked except the ones you had for the program supervisor.
Interview Questions: Would you have an issue working with individuals that were abused?

title: Business Office Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: They require that you offer multiple references and those references have to respond by phone before they make an offer to hire, They require a background check and drug testing.
Interview Questions: what my experience was in the field

title: Milieu Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Louisville, TN) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Apply online, someone calls you for an on-site interview. No difficult questions. You accept the offer and do a week of training at the main office in Knoxville. Computer modules, CPR, etc.
Interview Questions: I can't remember the questions really. I went to school with some guys that worked there. No hassles or headaches.

title: Adult IST Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: I went in for the interview amd was shocked that the interviewer did not ask me one single question about my experience. The interviewer just browsed my resume, asked if I could verify my education and references and then proceeded to explain the job. I was given the offer on the spot with literally no questions asked.
Interview Questions: Does this sound like a job you could do?

title: Case Manager/Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: Was a one on one interview with the program coordinator.  Was very basic interview questions-tell me about yourself, how would you handle certain situations
Interview Questions: Describe how you would handle the situation when you are being hit on by a client on your caseload

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at McNabb Center (Knoxville, TN) in Jan 2009
Interview Descriptions: Great interview process. Detailed and informative
